    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(CourseDBElement element)
        This method will take a CourseDBElement and add it to the data structure. If a linked list at the relevant hash code doesn’t exist, it creates a LinkedList with the first element being the CDE and add it to the HashTable. If the LinkedList already exists, add the CDE to the existing list
        Specified by:
        add in interface CourseDBStructureInterface
        Parameters:
        element - CourseDBElement object

      • get

        public CourseDBElement get(int crn)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        This method takes a CRN and return its mapped Course DB element, if the course doesn't exists it throws an IOException
        Specified by:
        get in interface CourseDBStructureInterface
        Parameters:
        crn - CRN of the course
        Returns:
        CourseDBElement object for the given CRN
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getTableSize

        public int getTableSize()
        Description copied from interface: CourseDBStructureInterface
        Returns the size of the ConcordanceDataStructure (number of indexes in the array)
        Specified by:
        getTableSize in interface CourseDBStructureInterface
